content: this crochet baby blanket pattern is delicate cozy and absolutely stunning when using a variegated yarn with a complementary solid it is a modern twist on the granny square blanket a more grown up feeling baby blanket you might like it so much that you just keep going until it s big enough to toss it on your own bed or couch please note that a pdf version of this pattern is available for purchase in my ravelry store to view the free version with ads go to https //www caabcrochet com/crochet-baby-blanket-pattern materials size 3 yarn 1276 yards i used loops & threads cozy baby in sedona size 3 or 4 yarn see notes below* 450 yards i used lion brand feels like butta in charcoal us i9/ 5 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors gauge gauge is not terribly important in this project since it is not a wearable however if you would like to check your gauge the best place to check is after round 7 after round 7 my project was approximately 5 ½ by 5 ½ sizing pattern is written for a baby blanket approximately 39 inches wide 38-40 depending on how much you stretch when laying it out stitches used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet special stitch bean stitch abbreviations st stitch yo yarn over chain space chain space * regarding yarn weights the particular yarns that i used worked well together despite being different weights 3 & 4 because the 4 was a rather light 4 and the 3 was a rather hefty 3 so if you choose true 3 and 4 weights you might notice more of a difference between the row than i did you ll want the yarn to be at least close in weight
